achievements.title: Certifications and Courses
achievements.description: Here are some of the certifications and courses I have completed.

list.title: High School Diploma
list.description: High School in Social Sciences, with a focus on economics, psychology, sociology, and history.

list.title: FullStack Bootcamp 750 Hours
list.description: React, Node.js, Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, testing (Jest, Vitest), and security (JWT, OAuth2.0). Focus on best practices and tools such as Git and Vscode.

list.title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
list.description: Networking Academy course covering the basics of cybersecurity and how to protect systems from common threats.

list.title: Fundamentals with Python 2
list.description: Introductory course on Python 2, covering the essentials to get started with programming in this language.
